She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Hugo Weaving, Levi Miller, Angourie Rice, Dan Wyllie and Aaron McGrath star in the story of Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14 living in a small town in Western Australia. In the dead of night during the scorching summer of 1969, Charlie is startled when he is woken by local mixed-race outcast Jasper Jones outside his window. Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.(n)

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: Tara checks into a facility that specializes in dissociation, where she is urged to delve more deeply into her suppressed memories of the past.(n)

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: In Season 1 finale, Tara comes face to face with an important person from her past, and begins to heal some of her pain by reconciling with Marshall.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees.(n)

programme.title: Prince: Sign 'o' the Times
programme.desc: This concert film features clips of live stage performances from Rotterdam and Minnesota, and is also interspersed with short films from the artist. Fan favorites, such as 'Little Red Corvette' and 'U Got the Look,' are performed as Prince is accompanied on stage by Sheena Easton and drummer Sheila E.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Hugo Weaving, Levi Miller, Angourie Rice, Dan Wyllie and Aaron McGrath star in the story of Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14 living in a small town in Western Australia. In the dead of night during the scorching summer of 1969, Charlie is startled when he is woken by local mixed-race outcast Jasper Jones outside his window. Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).(n)

programme.title: Killshot
programme.desc: An innocent couple that crosses paths with a professional assassin is forced into the witness protection program while the resourceful killer hunts them down in this crime thriller starring Diane Lane, Mickey Rourke and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta.(n)

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: Yes
programme.desc: In the Season 2 premiere, a shocking event in the Gregsons' neighborhood changes their lives and opens their door on Tara's family secrets.(n)

programme.title: Trouble Junction
programme.desc: Tara realizes that her "alters" are showing up again but keeps her condition a secret; Max decides to renovate the house they have inherited and flip it; a newly engaged Charmaine asks to move in with the Gregsons; Marshall dates a girl.(n)

programme.title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
programme.desc: This insightful, hysterically funny documentary follows comedienne Joan Rivers through a year of her life while looking back on her groundbreaking, barrier-breaking career as one of the first women to make a name for herself in the tough, male-dominated world of show business.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: The Pride of the Yankees
programme.desc: The biography of baseball immortal Lou Gehrig (1903-41) is a real-life American success saga about a poor boy from New York City who gets an athletic scholarship to Columbia University, signs a contract with the hometown Yankees and becomes a superstar, until felled by the fatal disease that now bears his name.

programme.title: Sergeant York
programme.desc: Gary Cooper won an Oscar for his portrayal of Alvin C. York, a sharpshooting Tennessee mountaineer turned World War I hero who singlehandedly killed 25 Germans and captured 132 in one day's action in the Argonne Forest. Cooper had to be talked into taking the role, and it was by York himself.

programme.title: The Story of Dr. Wassell
programme.desc: Gary Cooper plays the doctor who helped the wounded in Java. Laraine Day, Signe Hasso, Dennis O'Keefe. Van Daal: Carl Esmond. Murdock: Paul Kelly. Ping: Philip Ahn. Three Martini: Carol Thurston. The war, Cecil B. De Mille style. Lavish production. From James Hilton's book.

programme.title: Friendly Persuasion
programme.desc: William Wyler's beautifully made film about a Quaker family in Civil War Indiana, where the father struggles to adhere to his pacifist ways, while his teenage son undergoes a crisis of conscience over whether to sign up for military service or not and be judged a coward. Oscar nominated for Best Picture, Adapted Screenplay, Director, Sound, Supporting Actor (Anthony Perkins) and Song ("Thee I Love"). Remade in 1975. (cc).

programme.title: I'll See You in My Dreams
programme.desc: A tribute to lyricist Gus Kahn. The standard biographical fictions, but the tunes and performances are a delight. Danny Thomas, Doris Day, Frank Lovejoy. Gloria: Patrice Wymore. Thompson: James Gleason. Harris: Jim Backus. Directed by Michael Curtiz.

programme.title: Romance on the High Seas
programme.desc: Spouses who don't trust each other each create a ruse to try and catch the other being unfaithful, resulting in a farcical series of romantic misunderstandings.

programme.title: The Winning Team
programme.desc: Fanciful baseball biography of Major League pitching great Grover Cleveland Alexander details his trials, tribulations, battle with the bottle and triumphs.

programme.title: Carson on TCM
programme.desc: A 1976 chat with Doris Day. (repeat).

programme.title: By the Light of the Silvery Moon
programme.desc: Nostalgic Americana set in post-World War I Indiana is a sequel to 1951's "On Moonlight Bay," and features Doris Day and Gordon MacRae reprising their roles as sweethearts enduring romantic ups and downs after his return from military service overseas. The soundtrack is highlighted by "Ain't We Got Fun" and the title tune.

programme.title: Tea for Two
programme.desc: An aspiring actress takes a bet that she can answer "no" to every question posed to her for 24 hours in order to win the opportunity to finance and star in her own Broadway musical. Based on the 1920s stage play and feature film "No, No, Nanette." The score features songs by George and Ira Gershwin, Richard Rodgers, Lorenz Hart, Al Dubin and Harry Warren.

programme.title: The Tunnel of Love
programme.desc: A farce about a husband who may have had an affair while drunk.

programme.title: Pillow Talk
programme.desc: Rock Hudson-Doris Day romp about a playboy songwriter and a career woman who feud over their shared party line, then meet and fall in love. An Oscar winner for Best Original Screenplay; Day was nominated for Best Actress; and Thelma Ritter received a Best Supporting Actress nod as Day's tipsy maid.

programme.title: Lover Come Back
programme.desc: In this battle-of-the-sexes romp, rival Madison Avenue ad executives stop at nothing to snare clients from each other. Paul Henning and Stanley Shapiro's script was nominated for Best Original Screenplay.(n)

programme.title: Send Me No Flowers
programme.desc: Doris Day-Rock Hudson vehicle in which he's a hypochondriac who mistakenly thinks he's dying, so he sets out to find a replacement spouse for his wife (Day), who in turn thinks he's covering up for an illicit affair and throws him out of their house.(n)

programme.title: The Thrill of It All
programme.desc: Satire of the advertising world is about the wife of a successful doctor whose life and house get turned upside-down when she becomes a popular TV pitch woman for a soap company.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Lace
programme.desc: Suspense yarn about an heiress (Doris Day) terrified by death threats. Rex Harrison, John Gavin, Myrna Loy, Roddy McDowall, Natasha Parry. Manning: Herbert Marshall. Dora: Hermione Baddeley. Nora: Doris Lloyd. Directed by David Miller.(n)

programme.title: Julie
programme.desc: A disturbed and possessive husband who confesses to his wife that he murdered her first spouse, will stop at nothing, including killing her, to keep her from leaving him. (repeat).(n)

programme.desc: Ruth Chatterton's acting breathes life into this slick, superficial tale of a society girl and her romantic problems. Bette Davis. Julian: George Brent. Greg: John Miljan. Allison: Adrienne Dore. Flo: Virginia Hammond. Davis: John Wray. Judge: Berton Churchill. Alfred E. Green directed.(n)

programme.title: They Call It Sin
programme.desc: A pretty church organist is lured away from Kansas by a city-slicker suitor. But when her benefactor is revealed to be a cad, she seeks refuge in the underbelly of New York's theater scene.(n)

programme.title: Baby Face
programme.desc: A seductress discovers how to use her charm, sexiness and allure to climb the social ladder, but realizes that despite all the riches she's gained, none have brought her happiness or fulfillment.(n)

programme.title: The Painted Veil
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a doctor immersed in his medical research has an affair with a British diplomat; but she chooses to go with her husband when he must travel to the interior of cholera-ridden China.(n)

programme.title: Stranded
programme.desc: A social-service worker torn between her love for an engineer and her dedication to the Traveler's Aid Society gets mixed up with gangsters.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of an Actress
programme.desc: An actress' wealthy boyfriend is ready to finance her next production, but ends up pulling away from her professionally and romantically after she discovers he's married.(n)

programme.title: Wings of the Navy
programme.desc: A love triangle develops between a woman and two brothers who are both Naval fighter pilots, as was their father.(n)

programme.title: Honeymoon for Three
programme.desc: An author juggles both his secretary fiancée and a married ex-flame who's convinced she's the inspiration for his new literary heroine.(n)

programme.title: The Great Lie
programme.desc: A socialite and a concert pianist compete for the affection of a playboy aviator, but do not meet until he goes missing while flying a mission for the government.(n)

programme.title: Dark Victory
programme.desc: A rich party girl is diagnosed with a potentially terminal brain tumor, driving her to an existential crisis, and the challenge of facing possible death with dignity. A Best Picture nominee, and Bette Davis was nominated for Best Actress as the ill woman. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Rains Came
programme.desc: India's torrential rains background the romance of a straying wife (Myrna Loy) and a Hindu physician (Tyrone Power) in this impressive version of the novel by Louis Bromfield. Tom: George Brent. Fern: Brenda Joyce. Esketh: Nigel Bruce. Phoebe: Jane Darwell. Maharani: Maria Ouspenskaya. Mrs. Simon: Marjorie Rambeau. Maharajah: H.B. Warner. Lily: Laura Hope Crews. Miss MacDaid: Mary Nash. Smiley: Henry Travers. Directed by Clarence Brown.(n)

programme.title: 'Til We Meet Again
programme.desc: Tear-jerking shipboard romance between a dying woman and a man convicted of murder and on his way to the gallows is a remake of the 1932 hit "One Way Passage." Frank McHugh supplies comic relief as he reprises his role as a tipsy pickpocket from the original.(n)

programme.title: Luxury Liner
programme.desc: A teenager becomes Cupid's assistant after she stows away on her father's "Love Boat"-type cruise ship, where she entertains passengers with songs while also finding herself falling for a young officer on the vessel.(n)

programme.title: My Reputation
programme.desc: A recent widow ignores convention and defies the expectations of her family when she falls for a handsome major while on a ski trip and becomes romantically involved with him.(n)

programme.title: Where East Is East
programme.desc: Lon Chaney as a trapper in Indo-China who struggles against the dangerous influence of his ex-wife in this silent melodrama. Directed by Tod Browning.(n)

programme.title: The Squaw Man
programme.desc: Cecil B. DeMille's third filming of the tale of an exiled Englishman who comes to America and marries an Indian. Winifred Kingston, who starred in the 1914 silent, has a small uncredited role in this version.(n)

programme.title: Kongo
programme.desc: Walter Huston is excellent as the maniacal ruler of a jungle empire. Tula: Lupe Velez. Ann: Virginia Bruce. Kingsland: Conrad Nagel. Gregg: C. Henry Gordon. Fuzzy: Curtis Neron. Hogan: Mitchell Lewis. Cookie: Forrester Harvey.(n)

programme.title: Mexican Spitfire
programme.desc: The first in the series about fiery Latina entertainer Carmelita (Lupe Velez) has her recent marriage to a stuffy-but-likable American businessman threatened by interference from his wealthy, snobbish aunt.(n)

programme.title: Mexican Spitfire Out West
programme.desc: Third entry in the series puts the fiery Latina in Las Vegas, where she is considering divorcing her straitlaced husband because she feels he's neglecting her.(n)

programme.title: Mexican Spitfire at Sea
programme.desc: In the fourth entry in the series, the fiery Latina newlywed believes she's finally getting a honeymoon as she and her husband take a Hawaiian cruise, but she is incensed when she discovers the getaway is really a business trip during which he's hoping to bag an important client.(n)

programme.title: Laughing Boy
programme.desc: Ramon Novarro and Lupe Velez give striking performances in this tale of a Navajo Indian and his unfaithful wide.(n)

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A washed-up Shakespearean actor cooks up a publicity scheme to break into radio by tutoring a popular Dixieland bandleader in how to perform the Bard's plays for a festival. John Barrymore's final screen appearance.(n)

programme.title: Strictly Dynamite
programme.desc: A poet is maneuvered into writing gags for a comic. James Durante, Lupe Velez. Nick: Norman Foster. Sylvia: Marian Nixon. Sam: Eugene Pallette. Mill: Minna Gombell. Specialty: Mills Brothers. Funny. Elliott Nugent directed.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: After her younger sister is chosen to take part, 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen volunteers to compete in her place in a cruel televised tournament in which 24 teenagers from a postapocalyptic society fight to the death for the entertainment of the masses in a competition known as the "Hunger Games," which are broadcast across the nation as entertainment, and to reinforce the government's total power. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: A murder victim's videotaped recollection of a Holocaust incident is shown at a trial in which two people stand accused of her killing. Stefan Anders: George Bartenieff. Dan Jensen: William Atherton. Kyle Mellors: Logan Marshall-Green. Leah Glaser: Shirl Bernheim. Stan Wallace: Al Freeman Jr. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney's murder is linked to an unsolved mob-related killing. Michael Bloomberg, mayor of New York, appears as himself. Wachtler: Vyto Ruginis. Biscotti: John Viscardi. Libretti: Steven Schirripa. Judge Bradley: Peter McRobbie. Tortomassi: Joseph Hindy. Berner: Lee Wilkof. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An editor is found dead in an apartment that's shared by one of her authors and a lawyer, both of whom insist they were out of town at the time of the murder. Evans: Robert Foxworth. Sarah: Sara Botsford. Adele: Cynthia Harris. Austin: Oren J. Sofer. Dalton: Guy Paul. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a model leads to an investigation involving her ex-husband, their son and the illegitimate daughter she'd given up for adoption. Sonja: Rene Augesen. Silverman: Bray Poor. Douglas: Adam Kaufman. Jimmy: Paul Lieber. Holland: David McCallum. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: In the prosecution of a fatal shooting, Schiff (Steven Hill) refuses the governor's order to seek the death penalty and is removed from the case---prompting him to sue the governor. programme.desc: Two teens (Rob McElhenney, Michael Maronna) are accused of killing a fast-food deliveryman. Tyrell: Donna Murphy. Adele: Ellen Muth. Shatenstein: Sig Libowitz. Mr. Wheeler: James Handy. Mrs. Wheeler: Suzanne Costallos. Mrs. Timon: Ava Maria Carnevale. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Bloodstains in a hotel room lead to a case involving two students and a missing baby who they insist was stillborn. Christina: Mags Chernock. Tommy: Zach Chapman. Talbert: Benjamin Hendrickson. Garnett: James Rebhorn. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into a Navy pilot's death leads to a lieutenant (Kate Walsh) who was the deceased's lover. But McCoy faces military opposition over jurisdiction in the case. Miller: Patti LuPone. Mrs. Stroud: Molly Price. Billings: Daniel Von Bargen. (repeat) (cc).

programme.desc: Early final-round play in the 100th PGA Championship, from Bellerive CC in St. Louis. (live) (cc).

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: En route to another jail, notorious criminals hijack their plane and trap an ex-con on his way home. (cc).

programme.title: Avengers Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers unite to thwart the villainous Ultron from carrying out his evil plan to extinguish all human life on planet Earth. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Polska noc
programme.desc: Dla tych, którzy twierdzą, że w telewizjach muzycznych i radiach pojawia się za mało polskiej muzyki, Eska TV proponuje program "Polska noc". To całonocne pasmo zarezerwowane jest dla krajowych wykonawców.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Impreska
programme.desc: Zestawienie tanecznych hitów, które idealnie sprawdzają się na imprezach. W czasie programu widzowie mogą wysyłać wiadomości SMS.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news

Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Będę grał w grę
programme.desc: Magazyn skierowany do miłośników gier komputerowych. Jego autorzy omawiają i testują najnowsze propozycje, które trafiają na rynek.

programme.title: Mobmania
programme.desc: Program o nowinkach technicznych. Autorzy przedstawiają najnowsze gadżety, smartfony itp.

programme.title: Polska noc
programme.desc: Dla tych, którzy twierdzą, że w telewizjach muzycznych i radiach pojawia się za mało polskiej muzyki, Eska TV proponuje program "Polska noc". To całonocne pasmo zarezerwowane jest dla krajowych wykonawców.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(n)

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.(n)

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.(n)

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.(n)

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: Roy is helping to spring clean and is having fun, until Maura decides that Roy should go through his toys and give away the ones he doesn't play with anymore. Roy can't believe it ­ he loves all of his toys and doesn't want to give any to Mrs Barker's Charity Shop, The Old Bag. Roy isn't the only family member having trouble parting with their old, unused items. Bill becomes incredibly attached to some old tight fitting clothes, and there's a scarf Maura has her eye on too. Mr Barker is just as reluctant as Roy, and when Mrs Barker is about to catch them both hiding out in Reg's shed, Roy wonders what Wonder Roy would do? Wonder Roy loses his brand new cape in a villainous encounter with The Messer and Glitterella. He had given Finn his old cape ­ much to Finn's delight, and is reluctant to take it back, but Finn reassures him that who we are is much more important than the things we own. Back in reality, Roy remembers this, and teaches Mr Barker how good it feels to pass things on!

programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: Roy is intrigued when Joan calls over to style Maura and Becky's hair. Bill suggests Roy should use his natural creative talent to try styling Maura and Becky. Roy gives it a go and is delighted with the results. Maura, Becky, Bill and Joan are all amazed with the work Roy does on changing their looks. Roy is eager to have a makeover of his own. Joan does the honours, but every time she changes Roy's hairstyle, it plops back to its original appearance. Roy is crestfallen to realise he cannot change the way he looks. What would Wonder Roy do? In Toonville, Wonder Roy combats Gliterella with his new creation - a soapy water pistol. But, being Wonder Roy, he allows her the creative freedom to add a bit of sparkle to the dreary local library. Back in reality, Roy uses his creativity to fashion a wig for himself, but sadly accepts he is wasting his time. Bill points Roy's cartoon uniqueness and creative flair is something to be proud of. Roy finds solace in his dad's words and celebrates the fact he is a genius when it comes to making over people and in transforming the world around him with creativity.

programme.title: Where in the World
programme.sub-title: Hamza,Truc and Anushka: Truc has a little sleep - at school
programme.desc: Stories about the everyday lives of ordinary children living in eight different countries around the world. In this programme we visit three children who are all having a very busy day. In Jordan, seven-year-old Hamza is having trouble getting up for school. But will he get there in time? At school in Vietnam, Truc, who's seven, plays lots of games, has a tasty lunch and a little sleep with her friends. And after school in India, six-year-old Anushka learns how to draw patterns on the ground called Rangoli with her aunt. In each film we see that although children live in different countries, may look different and speak different languages, the joys and challenges of childhood are universal.

programme.title: Our Family

But will he be able to catch anything to eat for dinner?
